rationale: High frequency of use in the same demographic (digital-savvy households). Transportation users are often the same people ordering food/groceries.
recommended_approach: Ride & Dine: Get a 20% SnappFood discount code after every 5th ride; SnappMarket delivery tracking integrated into the ride-hailing map.
timing: Year-round, peaks during Ramadan (Iftar) and Yalda Night.

rationale: Travelers requiring domestic flights or hotels invariably need airport transfers or local city transport.
recommended_approach: The 'Full Trip' Bundle: Booking a flight on SnappTrip automatically triggers a discounted 'SnappEco' ride to the airport.
